Meta.title: Talent Scan - AI-Powered Resume Analysis & Candidate Screening
Meta.description: Transform your hiring process with AI. Upload resumes and get instant, comprehensive candidate insights, skills assessment, and hiring recommendations.
Meta.ogAlt: Talent Scan - AI-Powered Resume Analysis & Candidate Screening
Meta.orgDescription: AI-powered resume analysis platform for modern recruitment.
Meta.softwareDescription: AI-Powered Resume Analysis & Candidate Screening Tool with instant insights and skills assessment.

UploadMeta.uploadTitle: Upload Resume for AI Analysis | Talent Scan
UploadMeta.uploadDescription: Upload your resume and get instant, AI-powered analysis: skills extraction, experience scoring, culture-fit signals, strengths, risks, and actionable hiring recommendations.
UploadMeta.ogAlt: Talent Scan - Upload Resume for AI Analysis

LearnMoreMeta.pageTitle: About Talent Scan – AI-Powered Resume Analysis Platform | Talent Scan
LearnMoreMeta.pageDescription: Learn how Talent Scan transforms hiring with AI. Parse resumes, extract skills, score experience and culture fit, flag risks, and generate actionable recommendations for faster, data-driven decisions.

HistoryMeta.pageDescription: Review and manage your AI resume analysis history. Reopen reports, compare scores, track candidates, and export insights for compliant, data-driven hiring decisions.

AnalysisMeta.pageDescription: View AI-powered resume analysis results with overall match score, skill breakdowns, strengths, risks, and actionable hiring recommendations.

Footer.recruitmentDescription: Transform your recruitment process with advanced AI technology. Get instant, comprehensive candidate insights and make better hiring decisions faster.

Hero.title: Transform Your Hiring Process with AI
Hero.subtitle: Get instant, comprehensive candidate insights with our advanced AI-powered resume analysis platform.

Highlights.title: Project Highlights
Highlights.subtitle: Key features and capabilities of the Talent Scan platform.

ai.title: AI-Powered Analysis
ai.desc: Advanced machine learning evaluates resumes across 50+ criteria for comprehensive insights.

privacy.title: Privacy-First Design
privacy.desc: All processing happens locally in your browser. No resume data is stored on external servers.

multiLang.title: Multi-language Support
multiLang.desc: Available in English, German, and French, with more languages planned.

Benefits.title: Unlock Real Hiring Advantages
Benefits.subtitle: Elevate recruitment with AI-powered insights for faster, smarter decisions.

saveTime.title: Save Time
saveTime.desc: Analyze resumes in seconds instead of hours.

betterDecisions.title: Better Decisions
betterDecisions.desc: AI-powered insights help you make informed hiring choices.

reduceBias.title: Reduce Bias
reduceBias.desc: Objective analysis based on skills and experience.

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Get started with Talent Scan in just three simple steps.

upload.title: Upload Resume
upload.desc: Simply drag and drop a PDF resume or click to select.

analysis.title: AI Analysis
analysis.desc: Our advanced AI analyzes skills, experience, and fit.

insights.title: Get Insights
insights.desc: Receive detailed analysis with scores and recommendations.

FAQ.q1: How accurate is the AI analysis?
FAQ.a1: Our AI is trained on thousands of resumes and job descriptions, achieving high accuracy in skills identification and experience evaluation.
FAQ.q2: Is my data secure and private?
FAQ.a2: All resume processing happens locally in your browser. We do not store resume content on our servers.
FAQ.a3: We currently support PDF files up to 5MB. Additional formats are planned.
FAQ.q4: How much does Talent Scan cost?
FAQ.a4: Talent Scan is currently free to use to help organizations of all sizes.

GetStarted.title: Ready to Get Started?
GetStarted.subtitle: Upload your first resume and experience the power of AI-driven analysis.

UploadPage.didYouKnowText: Our AI analyzes over 50 different criteria to provide comprehensive candidate insights.
